EmailTemplate.subject: Ffreedom Day Coming in 3 days!!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Registration__c.Name},
“All the world is a laboratory to the inquiring mind” – Martin Fischer.
We are Happy that many an inquiring minds who believe in their dreams and want to take charge of their finances, are turning towards Ffreedom Day as their laboratory.
Ffreedom Day Laboratory will be open to its members on Sunday the 22nd of August 2010 at Hotel Novotel [erstwhile Holiday Inn] Juhu.
Each Ffreedom Family Memberparticipatingat the Ffreedom Day is attending with a reason, a purpose, that being ‘To Listen, To Explore, To Question, To Answer & To Collaborate’.
To help them with their purposewe shall have short ‘Ffreedom Talks’ by some of the leading speakers in their respective fields.
To give you a glimpseabout flow of events during the Ffreedom Day we have herein mentioned the Program Schedule for your convenience.
Program Schedule
10.30 - 11.00 am Registration (with Tea, Coffee & Refreshments) 11.00 – 11.15 am Opening Ceremony Ffreedom Talks on Happiness 11.30 – 12.15 pm Innovation Towards Happiness Mr Bhupendar Sharma [ CEO of nxtlyf and Strategic Innovation Consultant ]
From GDP (Gross Domestic Product) to GNH (Gross National Happiness) Ms Rajni Bakshi [ Author of Bazaars, Conversations and Freedom ]
Ffreedom Talks on Dreams 12.15 – 1.00 pm Just dial – My Dream Mr. V S S Mani [ CEO of Just dial ]
A Musical Dream Mr. Brahmanand Singh [ Film-maker and Wirter ]
Ffreedom Talks on Financial Freedom 1.00 – 1.35 pm Panel Discuss on Financial Freedom Moderator: Mr. Bhupendra Sharma Panelists – Sandeep Narang & Family, Tulika Upadhyay & Family Niraj Shah & Family 1.30 - 01.45 pm Closing Ceremony 1.45 pm onwards Lunch & Cocktail
3 Days to go…. Ffreedom day is coming….. Looking forward to meet you & your Family at the event.
Best Regards, Ffreedom team.
